featured.text: The belief that rapid speech and lying go together is also widespread and enduring.
The theory underlying it is that lying is stressful, and that this stress can be measured and recorded on a polygraph machine.

definition.zh_def: 說謊；不真實的陳述或行為
definition.en_def: The act of making a false statement with the intention to deceive.
definition.example: He was lying about his whereabouts last night.
